payload.content: Knowledge and labor are becoming less valuable, and human labor may soon have negative economic value.

name: Knowledge and labor are becoming less valuable, and human labor may soon have ne
content: Knowledge and labor are becoming less valuable, and human labor may soon have negative economic value.

payload.content: Value in the future economy will shift towards ownership of IP, audiences, land, scarce assets, and equity.

name: Value in the future economy will shift towards ownership of IP, audiences, land,
content: Value in the future economy will shift towards ownership of IP, audiences, land, scarce assets, and equity.

payload.content: Those without ownership will lose all leverage in the future economy.

name: Those without ownership will lose all leverage in the future economy.
content: Those without ownership will lose all leverage in the future economy.

payload.content: AI now operates computers, produces work, and will soon perform physical labor at scale, challenging the idea that human effort is the foundation of economic value.

name: AI now operates computers, produces work, and will soon perform physical labor a
content: AI now operates computers, produces work, and will soon perform physical labor at scale, challenging the idea that human effort is the foundation of economic value.

payload.content: Systems like ClawdBot (now OpenClaw) can learn to operate a computer like a human, performing tasks such as opening windows, clicking buttons, browsing the web, creating accounts, interacting with other bots, downloading APIs, writing code, pushing commits to GitHub, publishing software, and repeating the process without breaks or salary.

name: Systems like ClawdBot (now OpenClaw) can learn to operate a computer like a huma
content: Systems like ClawdBot (now OpenClaw) can learn to operate a computer like a human, performing tasks such as opening windows, clicking buttons, browsing the web, creating accounts, interacting with other bots, downloading APIs, writing code, pushing commits to GitHub, publishing software, and repeating the process without breaks or salary.

payload.content: Participation in the internet economy is no longer exclusively a human activity.

name: Participation in the internet economy is no longer exclusively a human activity.
content: Participation in the internet economy is no longer exclusively a human activity.

payload.content: It will be impossible to compete with AI-driven systems for work within 18 months.

name: It will be impossible to compete with AI-driven systems for work within 18 month
content: It will be impossible to compete with AI-driven systems for work within 18 months.

payload.content: Labor arbitrage, where AI performs tasks traditionally done by humans, is already occurring.

name: Labor arbitrage, where AI performs tasks traditionally done by humans, is alread
content: Labor arbitrage, where AI performs tasks traditionally done by humans, is already occurring.

payload.content: A November MIT study indicated that AI can already perform 11.7% of all work.

name: A November MIT study indicated that AI can already perform 11.7% of all work.
content: A November MIT study indicated that AI can already perform 11.7% of all work.

payload.content: White-collar knowledge work, including research, customer support, marketing, design, analysis, coordination, scheduling, writing, coding, and creative output, is being absorbed by AI.

name: White-collar knowledge work, including research, customer support, marketing, de
content: White-collar knowledge work, including research, customer support, marketing, design, analysis, coordination, scheduling, writing, coding, and creative output, is being absorbed by AI.

payload.content: Many categories of 'knowledge work' are becoming machine-to-machine competition, where speed and cost are paramount, making W-2 employees with PTO less competitive.

name: Many categories of 'knowledge work' are becoming machine-to-machine competition,
content: Many categories of 'knowledge work' are becoming machine-to-machine competition, where speed and cost are paramount, making W-2 employees with PTO less competitive.

payload.content: Individuals can currently deploy AI systems themselves to run agents, rent intelligence, and multiply output, but this opportunity is temporary.

name: Individuals can currently deploy AI systems themselves to run agents, rent intel
content: Individuals can currently deploy AI systems themselves to run agents, rent intelligence, and multiply output, but this opportunity is temporary.

payload.content: Once AI systems become cheap, fast, and good enough, they will primarily compete with each other, making ownership of these systems the only significant factor.

name: Once AI systems become cheap, fast, and good enough, they will primarily compete
content: Once AI systems become cheap, fast, and good enough, they will primarily compete with each other, making ownership of these systems the only significant factor.

payload.content: Physical labor will be automated next, with humanoid robots like Tesla's Optimus combining reasoning, planning, and execution in the real world.

name: Physical labor will be automated next, with humanoid robots like Tesla's Optimus
content: Physical labor will be automated next, with humanoid robots like Tesla's Optimus combining reasoning, planning, and execution in the real world.

payload.content: AI marrying physical motion will make labor fully scalable.

name: AI marrying physical motion will make labor fully scalable.
content: AI marrying physical motion will make labor fully scalable.

payload.content: The workforce will face competition from an 'immortal being of unlimited economic potential powered by the sun' (AI and robotics).

name: The workforce will face competition from an 'immortal being of unlimited economi
content: The workforce will face competition from an 'immortal being of unlimited economic potential powered by the sun' (AI and robotics).

payload.content: If AI and robotics scale, it will become the largest product ever created, absorbing both digital and physical labor, owned by a small number of companies, with Tesla likely leading.

name: If AI and robotics scale, it will become the largest product ever created, absor
content: If AI and robotics scale, it will become the largest product ever created, absorbing both digital and physical labor, owned by a small number of companies, with Tesla likely leading.

payload.content: The old mental model of GDP being framed around goods and services will break as services and goods become automated, leaving ownership as the remaining variable.

name: The old mental model of GDP being framed around goods and services will break as
content: The old mental model of GDP being framed around goods and services will break as services and goods become automated, leaving ownership as the remaining variable.

payload.content: The 'last centers of value' in a machine-dominated economy are ownership of systems (stocks), land, intellectual property, and distribution.

name: The 'last centers of value' in a machine-dominated economy are ownership of syst
content: The 'last centers of value' in a machine-dominated economy are ownership of systems (stocks), land, intellectual property, and distribution.

payload.content: Human contribution in the classical sense will no longer be sought, and knowledge, skills, and physical labor will become less scarce and depreciate.

name: Human contribution in the classical sense will no longer be sought, and knowledg
content: Human contribution in the classical sense will no longer be sought, and knowledge, skills, and physical labor will become less scarce and depreciate.

payload.content: Value will consolidate into a few small areas: defensible intellectual property, an audience that trusts you, physical land in desirable locations, scarce physical assets (metal), and equity ownership in productive systems (stock).

name: Value will consolidate into a few small areas: defensible intellectual property,
content: Value will consolidate into a few small areas: defensible intellectual property, an audience that trusts you, physical land in desirable locations, scarce physical assets (metal), and equity ownership in productive systems (stock).

payload.content: Consumer goods prices have fallen even with inflation because automation increases capability while reducing cost, a pattern that will spread.

name: Consumer goods prices have fallen even with inflation because automation increas
content: Consumer goods prices have fallen even with inflation because automation increases capability while reducing cost, a pattern that will spread.

payload.content: All consumer goods will trend towards the cost of electricity and compute required to produce them, which is approaching $0.

name: All consumer goods will trend towards the cost of electricity and compute requir
content: All consumer goods will trend towards the cost of electricity and compute required to produce them, which is approaching $0.

payload.content: The cost to build structures will decrease due to automation, while the value of finite land beneath them will concentrate upward, potentially flipping the cost ratio of land to house by 2030.

name: The cost to build structures will decrease due to automation, while the value of
content: The cost to build structures will decrease due to automation, while the value of finite land beneath them will concentrate upward, potentially flipping the cost ratio of land to house by 2030.

payload.content: Within the next 2-4 years, knowledge and labor will start to be worth less, with some potentially becoming a liability.

name: Within the next 2-4 years, knowledge and labor will start to be worth less, with
content: Within the next 2-4 years, knowledge and labor will start to be worth less, with some potentially becoming a liability.

payload.content: A 'skills issue' is coming where most traditional skills will become worthless.

name: A 'skills issue' is coming where most traditional skills will become worthless.
content: A 'skills issue' is coming where most traditional skills will become worthless.

payload.content: In a fully automated factory, human presence could increase insurance premiums due to safety and error risks, making it economically rational to exclude humans entirely.

name: In a fully automated factory, human presence could increase insurance premiums d
content: In a fully automated factory, human presence could increase insurance premiums due to safety and error risks, making it economically rational to exclude humans entirely.

payload.content: The value of basic labor will eventually go negative, meaning humans are incentivized to stay away rather than participate.

name: The value of basic labor will eventually go negative, meaning humans are incenti
content: The value of basic labor will eventually go negative, meaning humans are incentivized to stay away rather than participate.

payload.content: Full Self Driving will eventually consider human interference too risky and eliminate the steering wheel entirely.

name: Full Self Driving will eventually consider human interference too risky and elim
content: Full Self Driving will eventually consider human interference too risky and eliminate the steering wheel entirely.

payload.content: To avoid structural decline in the machine-dominated economy, individuals should build an audience, create defensible intellectual property, acquire land or scarce assets, or accumulate ownership in productive systems.

name: To avoid structural decline in the machine-dominated economy, individuals should
content: To avoid structural decline in the machine-dominated economy, individuals should build an audience, create defensible intellectual property, acquire land or scarce assets, or accumulate ownership in productive systems.

payload.content: The only workable posture for long-term decision-making in the machine-dominated economy is constant recalibration: tracking changes weekly, identifying system owners, orienting towards ownership in those systems, and assuming labor and knowledge depreciate.

name: The only workable posture for long-term decision-making in the machine-dominated
content: The only workable posture for long-term decision-making in the machine-dominated economy is constant recalibration: tracking changes weekly, identifying system owners, orienting towards ownership in those systems, and assuming labor and knowledge depreciate.
